body: @Paladdin thanks for the translation and agreed!

FMC and her husband moved into their dream appartments, however, she was unhappy that she did not have beautiful and expensive trinkets like her neighbors. An older whore led her to the old farts who are the husbands of old hugs. The first it was a forced sex, but she changed her mind after getting the money and went to all the way of starting to engage in prostitution, thinking that everything would be fine if her husband did not find out. The older whore saw her as a threat to herself and her whore life and made her husband find out that the FMC cheated and engaged in prostitution. Her husband threw her out and divorced her. And now she is a low-class whore on the street and can only remember the days when she lived in a prestigious apartment. 
This is how every NTR and deception story should end.

So she finally arrived at her dream home with her man but couldn't fit in with the old hoes without money, started chasing the bag but crossed the og bitch that got her on with them old niggas. Og bitch had one a the old niggas leak her shit and ruin both her marriage and budding friendship with the old hoes. She's chased out of her dream home and in the end can only look up at what she once had as she now quite literally belongs to the streets as she's now stuck in the ghetto unable to provide for herself without selling herself.
